results.title: Simvastatin-Loaded Polymeric Nanoparticles: Targeting Inflammatory Macrophages for Local Adipose Tissue Browning in Obesity Treatment.
results.text_hl: Sim-NP administration led to the controlled release of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@ within AT, directly impacting MPhi activity and inducing AT browning while inducing @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@.

citations.NLM: Mohaghegh N, Ahari A, Buttles C, Davani S, Hoang H, Huang Q, Huang Y, Hosseinpour B, Abbasgholizadeh R, Cottingham AL, Farhadi N, Akbari M, Kang H, Khademhosseini A, Jucaud V, Pearson RM, Hassani Najafabadi A. Simvastatin-Loaded Polymeric Nanoparticles: Targeting Inflammatory Macrophages for Local Adipose Tissue Browning in Obesity Treatment. ACS Nano. 2024 Sep 29;():. PMID: 39342648

results.title: Simvastatin mitigates diabetic nephropathy by upregulating farnesoid X receptor and Nrf2/HO-1 signaling and attenuating oxidative stress and inflammation in rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ effectively ameliorated @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@, @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@kidney hypertrophy@@@, body @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@, and @DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue injury and@@@ @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ animals.

citations.NLM: Hasan IH, Shaheen SY, Alhusaini AM, Mahmoud AM. Simvastatin mitigates diabetic nephropathy by upregulating farnesoid X receptor and Nrf2/HO-1 signaling and attenuating oxidative stress and inflammation in rats. Life Sci. 2024 Mar 1;340():122445. PMID: 38278349

results.title: The effects of HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors on disease activity in multiple sclerosis: A systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: In @DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis_Chronic_Progressive @DISEASE_MESH:D020528 @@@SPMS@@@, stand-alone @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ led to significantly reduced annualized rate of whole-brain @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@volume reduction@@@.

citations.NLM: Stefanou MI, Palaiodimou L, Katsanos AH, Milionis H, Kosmidou M, Lambadiari V, Halvatsiotis P, Ferentinos P, Andreadou E, Marinos G, Theodorou A, Tzartos JS, Voumvourakis K, Tsivgoulis G, Giannopoulos S. The effects of HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors on disease activity in multiple sclerosis: A systematic review and meta-analysis. Mult Scler Relat Disord. 2022 Feb;58():103395. PMID: 35216778

results.title: Vascular reactivity in the experimental, simvastatin-treated diabetes with endothelial dysfunction.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: We observed that @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight-loss@@@ observed in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were partially treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, but were still different from the control group.

citations.NLM: Yalcin S, Köksoy C, Ergül E, Demirel E, Yalcin B. Vascular reactivity in the experimental, simvastatin-treated diabetes with endothelial dysfunction. Bratisl Lek Listy. 2008;109(11):477-82. PMID: 19205554

results.title: A comparative clinical study of hypolipidemic efficacy of Amla (Emblica officinalis) with 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-coenzyme-A reductase inhibitor simvastatin
results.text_hl: Similarly, treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ produced significant @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@reduction@@@ of TC (P<0.0001), LDL (P<0.0009), @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@TG@@@ and VLDL (P<0.017), and a significant increase in HDL levels (P<0.0001).

citations.NLM: Gopa B, Bhatt J, Hemavathi KG. A comparative clinical study of hypolipidemic efficacy of Amla (Emblica officinalis) with 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-coenzyme-A reductase inhibitor simvastatin Indian J Pharmacol. 2012 Mar;44(2):238-42. PMID: 22529483

results.title: Effects of simvastatin on 5-fluorouracil-induced gastrointestinal mucositis in rats.
results.text_hl: The @CHEMICAL_Fluorouracil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005472 @@@5-FU@@@+@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Fluorouracil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005472 @@@5-FU@@@/SIMV) group was treated with @CHEMICAL_Fluorouracil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005472 @@@5-FU@@@ (50mg/kg), plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (10mg/kg), in the same way.

citations.NLM: Medeiros ADC, Azevedo ÍM, Lima ML, Araújo Filho I, Moreira MD. Effects of simvastatin on 5-fluorouracil-induced gastrointestinal mucositis in rats. Rev Col Bras Cir. 2018 Oct 18;45(5):e1968. PMID: 30379218

results.title: Protective effect of simvastatin and rosuvastatin on trinitrobenzene sulfonic acid-induced colitis in rats
results.text_hl: DAI score, an indicator of the severity of @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@intestinal inflammation@@@, was a significant increase in the @DISEASE_Colitis @DISEASE_MESH:D003092 @@@colitis@@@ control group. In the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@-treated groups, we did not observe bloody stools, stools were better formed, and @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@ was lessened.

citations.NLM: Maheshwari RA, Balaraman R, Sailor GU, Sen DB. Protective effect of simvastatin and rosuvastatin on trinitrobenzene sulfonic acid-induced colitis in rats Indian J Pharmacol. 2015 Jan-Feb;47(1):17-21. PMID: 25821305

results.title: Simvastatin ameliorates diabetic nephropathy by attenuating oxidative stress and apoptosis in a rat model of streptozotocin-induced type 1 diabetes.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetes@@@ was induced by a single intraperitoneal injection of 55 mg/kg body weight @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@streptozotocin@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@STZ@@@) and both control and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ received 10 mg/kg @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ for 90 days. Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ diminished the body @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@, @CHEMICAL_Blood_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001786 @@@blood glucose@@@ and, serum @CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Urea @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014508 @@@urea@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Uric_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014527 @@@uric acid@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Al-Rasheed NM, Al-Rasheed NM, Bassiouni YA, Hasan IH, Al-Amin MA, Al-Ajmi HN, Mahmoud AM. Simvastatin ameliorates diabetic nephropathy by attenuating oxidative stress and apoptosis in a rat model of streptozotocin-induced type 1 diabetes. Biomed Pharmacother. 2018 Sep;105():290-298. PMID: 29860221

results.title: Effect of Simvastatin on 5-HT and 5-HTT in a Rat Model of Pulmonary Artery Hypertension.
results.text_hl: Cigarette smoke exposure resulted in significant reduction in animal body weight, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ significantly prevented smoke-induced @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@.

citations.NLM: Jiang X, Yuan L, Li P, Wang J, Wang P, Zhang L, Sun B, Sun W. Effect of Simvastatin on 5-HT and 5-HTT in a Rat Model of Pulmonary Artery Hypertension. Cell Physiol Biochem. 2015;37(5):1712-24. PMID: 26544069

results.title: A systematic review of the clinical effectiveness of orlistat used for the management of obesity.
results.text_hl: When @CHEMICAL_Orlistat @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077403 @@@orlistat@@@ was added to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, this proved to be more effective for @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@ than either drug used individually.

citations.NLM: O'Meara S, Riemsma R, Shirran L, Mather L, ter Riet G. A systematic review of the clinical effectiveness of orlistat used for the management of obesity. Obes Rev. 2004 Feb;5(1):51-68. PMID: 14969507
